transcript.text: Shalom this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries and this is my
testimony for today in the precious and
supreme love of Yahshua who is the first
and the last who is the great i am who
is the Word made flesh who opens a door
no man can shut and shuts a door no man
can open who magnifies his Torah who
stamps the Quran or hearts my precious
shed blood I write these words I am the
father of six children six very precious
children my jewels as I often fondly
refer to them with my friends my ex-wife
and her family hired an attorney and
they stood against me this day the 15th
day of the 8p per month and would not
let me be reunited with my children the
judge is her final word said I needed to
compromise and respect the beliefs that
don't match up with the word and
hopefully down the road this will pave
the way to making amends with my ex-wife
and her family in a very real way a
testimony went forth here in Oregon that
painted in stark terms good
a father wanting to be reunited with his
children to teach them how to love and
obey God versus an embittered ex-wife
and family who deny God Yahshua will
never have me respect that which he
calls an abomination
after the court hearing and after the
judge ruled against me in every way I
strolled through a beautiful park
painted with the intense yellows and
deep reds fiery oranges and potent
Purple's of trees surrendered on in
great grief tears streamed down my eyes
and my heart lay shattered with Indian
Psalm 126 verse 6 he that goeth forth
and weep a bearing precious seed shall
doubtless come again with rejoicing
bringing his sheaves with him
and again Joshua says blessed are those
who mourn now for they shall be
comforted how is it possible that his
tears fall down my face with a heart in
tatters such tremendous joy and peace
bloods my soul but through tribulation
Yahshua draws closer to me now than ever
before and as his peace even now rolls
through me as I read this testimony as
his joy redeeming me with his powerful
blood bursts from deep within i know
that i must do only one thing wait on
yahweh there are promises in his word
one is that the children belong to the
father and that it is his duty to teach
those children the word of Yahweh after
the park as I was driving home I saw in
my mind my six children dancing with me
and falls of gold and in fields of an
incredible splendor and for all eternity
I will know the joy of a father teaching
his children even as my Heavenly Father
will forever be teaching me yes I wait
on Yahweh well the righteous sufferer
much tribulation Yahshua delivers them
from it all
enjoy in peace and grief and brokenness
I wait on my Yahshua even so come
quickly a turn I Yahshua HaMashiach some
of left comments on my past YouTube
saying that I'm bitter and filled with
pride and anger the pure and hearts who
love Yahshua you know that I am part of
the body of Messiah and those of you who
are wicked you don't have a clue the
website is WWE recent oricom shalom
